TITLE: Academic Integrity Policy
DEF: Normative ethical standards, and advice for putting them into practice
TASK: The Academic Integrity Policy pattern underpins the establishment of ethical standards and practices for academic work, discouraging dishonesty and fostering a culture of honesty, trust, and responsibility. It clarifies expectations around academic honesty, prevents misconduct, and outlines procedures for addressing violations. To make it effective, it is necessary to develop a comprehensive policy, provide education and resources on academic integrity, and enforce the policy consistently.
